DEMO_907_MSG_001_1: ́ȁ, thank you for coming. We all remember that incident now.
DEMO_907_MSG_001_2:
́As the Djinn said, we were all shattered by that huge force and later revitalized as the Nochoras.
ā
Unlike the others, we were transformed back to our 4 original forms before we were united to become the Joker and then revitalized.
ā
DEMO_907_MSG_001_3:
́I hate to say this but I, along with Ace and Queen do not have even a fourth of the power we used to have.
ā
DEMO_907_MSG_001_4: ́We don't have enough power to close the phantom gate if we don't find our 4th guy to complete us.
DEMO_907_MSG_004: ́I went back to the original location but found nothing... Where the phantom gate moved is unknown, sir.
DEMO_907_MSG_005: ́Alright, please investigate further. Get to the bottom of this soon!

́We have to regain our powers as soon as possible. And we would like for you to use the Ra fuction to...

find our 4th guy, Wulfspade Ace and his older brother, Jester.
